text: Lipa may refer to the following people ;Given name *Lipa Schmeltzer (born 1978), American Hassidic entertainer ;Surname *Andreas Lipa (born 1971), Austrian football manager and former footballer *Dua Lipa (born 1995), English singer, songwriter and model *Elisabeta Lipă (born 1964), Romanian rower and government official *Mateusz Lipa (born 1994), Polish racing cyclist *Peter Lipa (born 1943), Slovak singer, composer and promoter of jazz *Shaily Lipa (born 1974), Israeli cookbook author *Stefan Lipa (born 1953), New Zealand politician
title: Lipa (name)
